ygData.subject: human sk fac
ygData.msgSnippet: being a human sk of innoruuk, i can tell you that not only can i train in neriak, the necro guild views me warmly ;p however, since i started working on fac on
ygData.messageBody:
being a human sk of innoruuk, i can tell you that not only can i train in
neriak, the necro guild views me warmly ;p

however, since i started working on fac on them a LONG time ago, they may
have slightly lowered human fac with the dead in the meantime.. my wife was
indifferent and unable to train when she first went to them :( but we're
working on that ;)

another interesting question: human sk fac with the heretics of odus. this
may be important once they add paineel, which is a city full of erudite
necros. i know that human sk of innoruuk starts out threateningly to them :(
i've been working on killing a few erudite npcs to raise fac with them, but
it isnt easy.. guard ranlan in fp assisted palatos kynarn (a silly erudite
enchanter in the slums) for no apparent reason, even tho ranlan views me
kindly. its the only time i've ever seen the militia assist an npc other
than a merchant or another militia member, and i dont know why he did in
this case. in any event, ranlan is a total badass, and beat my good looking
behind into the ground ;p so just be careful if you plan on harvesting
palatos for heretic faction ;)

by the way.. i know DE sk of innoruuk defaults to apprehensive to the
heretics (gotta love that guise of the deciever) and TSK of cazic thule may
actually have some fairly good faction with them.. unsure of how anybody
else stands with them tho.

one last thing: i got MM faction by killing princess lenya. MASSIVE faction
change. however, she is no longer in highkeep as of a recent patch.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
